verses.name: Judges 3:11
verses.text: And the land had rest forty years. And Othniel the son of Kenaz died.

verses.name: Judges 3:12
verses.text: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the Lord: and the Lord strengthened Eglon the king of Moab against Israel, because they had done evil in the sight of the Lord.

verses.name: Judges 3:13
verses.text: And he gathered unto him the children of Ammon and Amalek, and went and smote Israel, and possessed the city of palm trees.

verses.name: Judges 3:14
verses.text: So the children of Israel served Eglon the king of Moab eighteen years.
